metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19132 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
Squid before 4.4, when SNMP is enabled, allows a denial of service (MemoryLeak) via an SNMP packet.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19132` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

squid - 3.5.12-1ubuntu7.7
squid-cgi - 3.5.12-1ubuntu7.7
squid-common - 3.5.12-1ubuntu7.7
squid-purge - 3.5.12-1ubuntu7.7
squid3 - 3.5.12-1ubuntu7.7
squidclient - 3.5.12-1ubuntu7.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: squid3 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.5.12-1ubuntu7.7').
